text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
You, go and pick up the following 
horsegirls for the next mock race.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
Mejiro Ramonu, Mr. C.B.…… 
…… Ahh! Gold Ship and Sweep Tosho 
should be good too.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
They're all a bit quirky, but…… gather
them like your life depends on it.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
If you finish this task…… I'll show you 
something real special in return.
